==Japanese==

===Kanji===
{{ja-kanji|grade=|rs=女11}}

====Readings====
* {{ja-readings|kanyoon=[[おう]] (ō)|goon=[[う]] (u)|kanon=[[う]] (u)|kun=[[おうな]] (ōna), [[あたためる]] (atatameru)}}

===Etymology===
Originally /omi<small>1</small>na/. Likely realized as [omina] (see [[w:Jōdai Tokushu Kanazukai|Jōdai Tokushu Kanazukai]]). The initial /o/ expressed "grown, large" and contrasted with /wo/ "young, youth" found in [[女|womina]] "woman".

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おみな}}

# a grown woman
# an old woman
